A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not being a big fan of most of the Space Wizard franchise\, I really like the newer movies (E7\, Rogue One).

Not only does this have a great production value and great directorial choices: the actors are perfect for their roles.

The writing is fairly good\, the worst bits being the classic Space Wizards stuff where entire civilizations are being commanded because some super powered teen is cranky.

Sure it has some problems\, but is overall very good and I not only look forward to the sequel\, but watching it and the 7-9 trilogy again.
